review: Such an amazing game, especially when playing on 'Ranger Hardcore' difficulty. Really gives you a glimpse of the hardships and shortage on supplies and ammo people would go through under such circumstances like an apocalypse. The story is great and the fact that to get a good ending relies on more than just simple choices really makes this game. Try it out guys! And play its predecessor Metro 2033 first.
